Name: Match 3 Revolution
About the game: Match 3 Revolution” is an original physics Match 3/ Marble Popper game. Its main features are: - Create sets of at least 3 touching balls of the same color. - 100 Levels of Unique Gameplay. - Original game modes: click a ball, draw a line, drop a ball and play pinball. - Supercharge with combos. - A lot of power-ups (electroball, fireball, megabomb, fusionball, missiles,…). - Top 50 Online World Ranking in every level. - Original music.
